Curriculum Vitae

Notes on pseudo-holomorphic curves: 2024 2021

Papers: (The published versions may differ slightly from the local version here.)

  1. Representability in non-linear elliptic Fredholm analysis. Submitted to the Proceedings of the International Congress of Basic Science. (2023).

  2. Universally counting curves in Calabi--Yau threefolds. Preprint. (2023).

  3. Orbifold bordism and duality for finite orbispectra. Geom. Topol. 27 (2023), no. 5, 1747--1844. Published Version. MR4621920.

  4. Enough vector bundles on orbispaces. Compos. Math. 158 (2022), no. 11, 2046--2081. Published Version. MR4515091.

  5. Smoothing finite group actions on three-manifolds. Duke Math. J. 170 (2021), no. 6, 1043--1084. Published Version. MR4255050.

  6. (with Sheel Ganatra and Vivek Shende). Microlocal Morse theory of wrapped Fukaya categories. Ann. of Math. (2) 199 (2024), no. 3.

  9. (with Sheel Ganatra and Vivek Shende). Covariantly functorial wrapped Floer theory on Liouville sectors. Publ. Math. Inst. Hautes Études Sci. 131 (2020), 73--200. Published Version. MR4106794.

  10. Contact homology and virtual fundamental cycles. J. Amer. Math. Soc. 32 (2019), no. 3, 825--919. Published Version. MR3981989.

  11. (with Emmanuel Giroux). Existence of Lefschetz fibrations on Stein and Weinstein domains. Geom. Topol. 21 (2017), no. 2, 963--997. Published Version. MR3626595.

  12. An algebraic approach to virtual fundamental cycles on moduli spaces of pseudo-holomorphic curves. Geom. Topol. 20 (2016), no. 2, 779--1034. Published Version. MR3493097.

  13. The Hilbert--Smith conjecture for three-manifolds. J. Amer. Math. Soc. 26 (2013), no. 3, 879--899. Published Version. MR3037790.

  14. The link concordance invariant from Lee homology. Algebr. Geom. Topol. 12 (2012), no. 2, 1081--1098. Published Version. MR2928905.

  15. (with János Kollár). Algebraic varieties with semialgebraic universal cover. J. Topol. 5 (2012), no. 1, 199--212. Published Version. MR2897053.

  16. On the distortion of knots on embedded surfaces. Ann. of Math. (2) 174 (2011), no. 1, 637--646. Published Version. MR2811613.

  17. Central limit theorems for uniform model random polygons. J. Theoret. Probab. 25 (2012), no. 3, 823--833. Published Version. MR2956214.

  18. Central limit theorems for random polygons in an arbitrary convex set. Ann. Probab. 39 (2011), no. 3, 881--903. Published Version. MR2789578.

  19. Concurrent normals to convex bodies and spaces of Morse functions. Math. Ann. 352 (2012), no. 1, 55--71. Published Version. MR2885575.

  20. On the unfolding of simple closed curves. Trans. Amer. Math. Soc. 361 (2009), no. 4, 1749--1764. Published Version. MR2465815.
